org.drip.product.credit

Class BasketProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.credit.BasketProduct
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasketMarketParamRef
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketBond, BasketDefaultSwap

    public abstract class BasketProduct
extends Serializer
implements BasketMarketParamRef
    This abstract class extends BasketMarketParamRef. Provides methods for getting the basket’s components, notional, coupon, effective date, maturity date, coupon amount, and list of coupon periods.
